text:
Day 83

2020 has more to give.

The public finding out about toxic #PFOS and #PFAS chemicals in UK waters. 

 @EnvAgency @DefraWater @GeorgeMonbiot @carolecadwalla @BBCNews @Channel4News @jonsnowC4 @EnvAgencyYNE @WCL_News @annalom87 @GeorgeGreenwood https://t.co/kTMLWKKZPP

We speak to Joanne Holt from the @EnvAgency to find out how Nominet supports their important work protecting the UK #environment from #WasteCrime. Read her blog here: https://t.co/OUEJ6iDncf #RespectProtectEnjoy #Registry #ccTLD https://t.co/ObuZVnP6DM
And well yes. What happens when all the grass, trees etc spring up? @EnvAgency ? Who pays? @HalsteadGazette https://t.co/SrAATwbnpV
Well is this it? Is this what an  @EnvAgency week long tidy up looks like? Those trees down there look big? Anything actually cleared? Wonder what it cost @HalsteadGazette https://t.co/qRw18KNYIi
RT @AquaUoS: Enhancement of the sediment build up at a frequent breach point on the beck has taken a few floods to instigate channel switch‚Ä¶

@EnvAgencySE Don't take any shit off gypsies who turn up at your door. My old mum had some Irish navvy knock to ask if she wanted the drive tarmacked. Cor. She sent him off with a flea in his ear! He almost broke the 100-metre record trying to get away!
RT @EnvAgencyMids: There will be a release of water from Ladybower Reservoir #Derbyshire  tomorrow (Wed) from 8.30am to increase #Flood  st‚Ä¶
RT @EnvAgencySE: If you're having a clear-out and need someone to get rid of your rubbish - check they are a registered waste carrier first‚Ä¶
RT @EnvAgencySE: If you're having a clear-out and need someone to get rid of your rubbish - check they are a registered waste carrier first‚Ä¶
